abstract: The award is the first of what will be an annual honor for choreographers.
snippet: The award is the first of what will be an annual honor for choreographers.
lead_paragraph: Trisha Brown, the modern dance choreographer, is to receive a "Bessie" award for lifetime achievement, the selection committee for the awards announced Tuesday. The Bessies, formally known as the New York Dance and Performance awards, and established in 1983 are named for the dance educator and mentor Bessie Schonberg.

headline.main: Trisha Brown to Receive 'Bessie' Lifetime Achievement Award
